translations: v．浪费，挥霍：把时间、金钱或资源用在无意义或无益的事情上。
· He squanders his money on useless things.
他把钱浪费在无用的东西上。

sentences.sentence: She squanders fine time on clothes.
sentences.translation: 她把大好时光都花在衣服上了。

sentences.sentence: In squandering the health of its young, the world squanders its tomorrows.
sentences.translation: 年轻人在挥霍自己健康的同时世界也在浪费着他的未来。

sentences.sentence: Choice not only erodes commitment and squanders our time, it can also change personality.
sentences.translation: 选择不仅磨灭了承诺，浪费了我们的时间，而且能改变个性。
